message: Let's split it evenly, Bob. Fair is fair!
I think I deserve a bit more, don't you?
Okay, I'll give you a slightly bigger share this time, but I'm not willing to give up much more. Let's end this now.
I'm willing to take a risk for a bigger share. Inflation is eating into my profits!
Bob, I'm getting tired of this. Inflation is hurting us both. Let's end this by splitting it a bit closer to my last offer. This is my final offer.
